South African summers can be a glorious thing, but at 40 degrees? Not so much.
Love life this summer and stay cool and comfortable with the homechoice range. From fans, to fridges, lightweight bedding and light-blocking curtains, we’ve got all you need to make your home the coolest spot on the block!
Keep the cool air flowing

in your home with our range of fans and air coolers. From ceiling fans to standing fans, and portable air cons to air coolers, you’ll find the perfect cooling system to suit your needs.

SHOP THE RANGE
Make the most of your outdoor area

and create a chill zone with our outdoor furniture. You’ll find a variety of seating options and a selection of covers to protect you from the scorching sun.

SHOP THE RANGE
For ventilation and airflow

while you’re sleeping, opt for light-coloured bedding made from lightweight and breathable fabric such as cotton.

SHOP THE RANGE
If you can’t beat it, block it!

Block-out, or blackout curtains not only keep the light out, but the heat as well, absorbing as much as 24% of it! Pair that cool hack with a cooling fan and summer at home will be a breeze.

SHOP THE RANGE
When you’re dehydrated

and your body cannot produce enough sweat to cool you down, this can result in heatstroke. Keep the cool water flowing with a water dispensing fridge and make sure you have tons of space for your ice cream stockpile with a deep freezer.

SHOP THE RANGE
If you still want to catch some rays

without catching all the heat, fill a pool with cold water and enjoy a refreshing outdoor summer set up with the family.

SHOP THE RANGE
Cooking inside creates even more heat

inside the house. Instead of cooking on the stove, save some energy (and your sanity!) and enjoy a candid braai with the family.

for women, men and kids is filled with summer wardrobe essentials made of lightweight and breathable fabrics to keep you cool and breezy.
